scripts.release:patch: git checkout master && npm version patch -m "chore(update): patch release %s 🐛 "
scripts.release:minor: git checkout master && npm version minor -m "chore(update): release %s 🚀"
scripts.release:major: git checkout master && npm version major -m "chore(update): major release %s 💥 "
scripts.build:chrome: yarn clean:dist && webpack --config config/webpack.prod.ts --progress --env production --env target=chrome
scripts.build:firefox: yarn clean:dist && webpack --config config/webpack.prod.ts --env production --env target=firefox
scripts.build:edge: yarn clean:dist && webpack --config config/webpack.prod.ts --env production --env target=edge
scripts.build:opera: yarn clean:dist && webpack --config config/webpack.prod.ts --env production --env target=opera
